name: dragon_s_bane

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 24%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 28%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 32%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 36%.

description: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.
